name: 52
effect: Negate target recruit effect with cost 2 or less.

name: A Clash of Worlds
effect: Name a character. Character cards with that name are non-unique this turn.

name: Agility
effect:
Target Secret Society character gets +2 DEF this attack.
At the start of the recover phase, if Agility is in your KO'd pile, you may KO a character you control. If you do, return agility to your hand.

name: Alan Scott, Golden Age Engineer
effect:
Alan Scott enters play exhausted.
{Activate} ---> Recover and ready target stunned JSA character you control.

name: At Your Service
effect:
To play, discard a [Gotham Knights Icon] character card.
Search your deck for a card with the word "Batman" in its name, identity, or text. Reveal that card and put it into your hand.

name: Atomic Axe
effect:
Play only during the recovery phase.
KO target non-stunned character that was stunned this turn by a Future Foes character you controlled.

name: Brainiac 13, Mental Giant
effect:
Concealed
Backup: {Activate} ---> Target character gets -1 DEF this turn for each ongoing plot twist you control. Use only during the build phase.

name: Bring It On!
effect: Target [JLA] defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack for each opposing character.

name: Eradicator, Spirit of Krypton
effect: Wehn Eradicator team attacks, you may ready all other attackers. If you do, they can't attack again this turn.

name: Espionage, Non-Unique
effect:
Terraform
When you flip Espionage, it gains target opposing location's power while Espionage remains face up.

name: Flying High
effect:
Play only if you control a [Team Superman Icon] defender.
Remove from the game all attackers and equipment equipped to them, then return them to play equipped with the same equipment.

name: Guy Gardner, Hero with Attitude
effect:
Reservist, Willpower 4
{Activate} ---> Stun target character with cost 3 or less. Use only if you control four or fewer resources.

name: Hush, Silent and Deadly
effect: While Hush is not adjacent to any character, whenever he stuns an exhausted character, KO that character.

name: I'm Back, Poozers!
effect: Recover target stunned [Green Lantern Icon] character you control with cost less than the total willpower of characters you control.

name: Jared Stevens ~ Fate, Mystic Defender
effect:
Pay X resource points [>] KO target unique equipment with cost X.
Magic plot twists cost you 1 less to play.

name: Origin Story
effect:
To play, return a character you control to its owner's hand.
Search your deck for a card with the same name as that character, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

name: Parallax, Embodiment of Fear
effect: Whenever a character with cost 5 or less becomes stunned, KO it.

name: Ring of the Sinestro Corps
effect:
Concealed-Optional
Equip only to an [Sinestro Corps Icon] character.
Equipped character gets +2 / +2 and has flight and range.
At the start of the recovery phase, KO equipped character.

name: Roshambo
effect: Insanity: Play rock, paper, scissors against an opponent. If you win, exhaust a character that opponent controls and play again.

name: Royal Flush Gang, Non-Unique * Full House
effect:
A deck can have up to five cards named Royal Flush Gang.
When Royal Flush Gang enters play, all Royal Flush Gangs you control get +1 ATK this turn.

name: Super-Town
effect: Cosmic New Gods characters you control all have cosmic - surge.

name: Superman/Batman Robot, Supa-Mecha-Bat
effect:
Dual Loyalty
Boost X: Superman/Batman Robot enters play with two +1 / +1 counters for each resource point you paid for X.

name: Swiss Headquarters
effect: {Activate}, Exhaust a non-Army Checkmate character you control [>] Recover target Army Checkmate character you control at the start of the recovery phase this turn.

name: Teen Supremes
effect:
To play, exhaust X [Teen Titans Icon] characters you control.
Ready target character with cost X or less.

name: Thank Granny Goodness
effect:
Play only if you control a Darkseid's Elite character.
Turn all resources target opponent controls face down.

name: There is no Escape
effect: Ongoing: Whenever an Army Manhunter character you control becomes stunned, you may put a copy of that card from your resource row into your front row.

name: Too Ordinary
effect:
To play, remove two cosmic counters from characters you control.
Target character attacking a Legionnaires character you control can't cause breakthrough or ready this turn.
